shadow.name: CHAOS
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Difficulty at the Beginning, expressing through chaos

gift.name: INNOVATION
gift.description: The gift frequency of Difficulty at the Beginning, expressing through innovation

siddhi.name: INNOCENCE
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Difficulty at the Beginning, expressing through innocence

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 3 shadow frequency. The chaos you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural innovation. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from chaos to innovation.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your sacral. Notice the sensation of chaos.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 3 consciously for 7 days, the chaos pattern will shift toward innovation.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 3 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from chaos toward innovation
